price: 27. que mi Señor ha perdonado mis pecados y me ha honrado (haciéndome entrar al Paraíso)!”.
arabic: بِمَا غَفَرَ لِي رَبِّي وَجَعَلَنِي مِنَ ٱلۡمُكۡرَمِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: bimā ghafara lī rabbī wajaʿalanī mina al-muk'ramīna
